subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeranimo beat War Element by two and three-quarter lengths in the $250,000 Citation Handicap at Hollywood Park in a victory overshadowed by injuries and the deaths of two horses.
snippet: Jeranimo beat War Element by two and three-quarter lengths in the $250,000 Citation Handicap at Hollywood Park in a victory overshadowed by injuries and the deaths of two horses.
